lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
A prestigious school fraternity, Lhasa Apso Phi, is seeking new members ("pledges"). Would you like to join? (CONTINUE means "Yes".)

Good. You pledge name is "Fish Breath." Your pledge assignment is to steal a pair of girl's panties (with a Lhasa Apso brother as witness) and run them up the school flagpole. Do you still want to join?
O.K., Fish Breath. Your fraternity brother suggests you dress up in a girl's gym uniform, sneak into the locker room during gym class and steal the panties.
You successfully pass through the locker area unnoticed.
You find a locker with a nice pair of pink lace panties. You stop to wonder who they belong to....
You are on your way out the door.

It's the girls' Gym teacher, Mrs. Black. A young man told her that a MALE student was sneaking around the girl's lockers, trying to steal panties in order to obtain PERVERSE SEXUAL PLEASURES. You turn around, and are
immediately apprehended. Your fraternity brother set you up, but now you are one of the guys. Very funny.

It's only that stupid fraternity brother telling you he wants to "approve" the panties before you bring them all the way out. They pass inspection. You run them up the school flag pole early the next morning and become a full-blooded
